content: Yes, many tours combine a visit to the Terracotta Warriors and the Huaqing Hot Springs. These tours often include transportation, admission fees, and a tour guide. You can find these tours by searching online or asking at your hotel or a travel agency in Xian. Some of the tours might also include other attractions like the Giant Wild Goose Pagoda, Tang Paradise, or the Shaanxi History Museum. Just make sure you check the itinerary and choose the one that suits your interests and time constraints.
